first_translate: fiona,  you look lovely today as well.
I see that your hair is down again.
it suits you very much.

hangle: 너 때문에 머리를 내린 거 알고 있지?
first_translate: do you know why I let my hair down like this?
me? no...
of course!  I’m glad that my personal maid is so young and naive.

hangle: 내 담당 하녀가 아직 어리고 순진한 걸 다행으로 알아.
first_translate: my apologies...  I’ll try not to do anything bad from now on.
my apologies...  I’ll try not to do anything bad from now on.
at least she’s honest about her intentions.
well then, please keep yourself under control from now on.
sure thing, starting from now.
why are you smiling, siegren?
haha...
your highness, lady fiona.
thank you for coming tonight.
lady livia.
no, thank you for inviting us.
care for some drinks?
care for some drinks?
this peach cocktail happens to be one of my favorites too.
it tastes sweet and delicious.
wow, thanks.
wait--
make mine non-alcoholic instead.
doesn’t his highness drink at all?

hangle: 그건 아니지만, 오늘은 안 마시는 게 나을 것 같아서.
first_translate: not really, but I don’t think drinking would be wise for me right now.
but still,  thank you for offering, my lady.
indeed...
then may I have a glass with your partner here?
then may I have a glass with your partner here?
wow, how pretty!
if only briefly.
is there something you’d like to say to me?
you’re quite straightforward, aren’t you?
oh...
I forgot we were supposed to speak formally in these kinds of situations.
as a warrior,  I tend to get straight to the point when speaking.
may I ask if you remember our previous agreement?
may I ask if you remember our previous agreement?

hangle: “절 도우면 영애가 사교계에서 입지를 다질 수 있도록 도와줄게요.”
first_translate: “if you help me out,  I will make sure to establish your position within high society.”
of course.
and if you agree,
can we renew our contract?
renew it?

hangle: 요즘… 황후 폐하가 눈치를 과하게 주신답니다.
first_translate: the empress has been giving me such a hard time lately.
what did she tell you exactly?

hangle: 지금의 저는 황태자 전하를 쫓아낼 수 없는데요?
first_translate: right now,  I can’t even chase away the crown prince.

hangle: 물론 사람이 없는 장소에서 이미 한 대 때리기는 했지만.
first_translate: that said,  I already hit him once behind closed doors.

hangle: 나중에 제대로 복수도 할 거긴 하지만.
first_translate: I plan on getting revenge later anyway.
still, whether or not that helps you any...
I understand what you mean.

hangle: 이번 경우에는 제가 영애의 가능성에 기대를 건다는 것에 가깝겠네요.
first_translate: for now,  I suppose I am putting more faith into your potential than anyone else's.

hangle: 저보다는 시그렌 전하에게 거는 게 낫지 않겠어요?
first_translate: but wouldn’t it be better to put your trust in his highness rather than myself?
I prefer strong people over others.
while I believe his highness must also be strong,

hangle: 제 두 눈으로 똑똑히 확인한 건 전하 쪽이 아니라,
first_translate: from what I’ve seen firsthand,
it was actually you who showed greater skill.
twice, might I add.
to be frank,
I don’t dislike his highness either.
but...
but?
he doesn’t seem to recognize my face,

hangle: 하물며 다른 여자과 연관시켜서 떠올리는 분은 싫거든요.
first_translate: let alone associate other women with me.

hangle: 전에 시그렌 전하와 부딪힌 적이 있는데,
first_translate: when I ran into his highness before,
upon seeing my face,
ah, you’re friends with fiona...
those were the first words he spoke to me.

hangle: 이제껏 저를 한 번 보고 나서
first_translate: until now, every man I met remembered me immediately after meeting just once.

hangle: 첫 번째로 떠올리지 못한 남자는 없었는데!
first_translate: until now, every man I met remembered me immediately after meeting just once.

hangle: 저런 이야기를 하는데도 밉게 보이지가 않다니, 이것도 능력이야…
first_translate: even though you talk about things like that, you never come across as rude... perhaps that’s another talent of yours...
anyway,

hangle: 제 미래의 ‘가능성’에 기대를 걸고 도움을 주겠다는 뜻이죠?
first_translate: so does that mean you want to invest in my future by helping me?

hangle: 아쉽게도 프리실라 가문이 아닌 리비아의 도움이지만요.
first_translate: unfortunately,  it won’t be house priscilla lending their support, but rather myself personally.

hangle: 아버지는 어디까지나 중립의 위치를 지키려 하시니까요.
first_translate: my father wishes to remain neutral above everything else.

hangle: 그럼, 리비아 영애가 줄 수 있는 도움은 무엇인가요?
first_translate: then what kind of assistance could you offer me, lady livia?

hangle: 피오나 영애와 제가 사교계에서 더 친밀한 사이가 되는 거겠죠.
first_translate: I guess becoming closer friends with lady fiona in public.
if that’s the case,
then isn’t that simply being friends?
how awkwardly silent they both became!!!
i-in that case...
nice making friends with you?
friend.
nice meeting you too,
lady fiona.
sieg-- ah,
your highness.
did I keep you waiting long?
nope.
listen up, sieg.
lady livia asked me...
...to hang around together.
politically,  she remains neutral,

hangle: 그거랑 별개로 황태자가 너무 싫어서 내 쪽에 힘을 실어주고픈 모양이야.
first_translate: but aside from that,  she seems to hate the crown prince enough to lend me her strength.

hangle: 누가 들을 수도 있으니 밖으로 가자.
first_translate: let’s go outside since someone might hear us talking.
I despise him too.
but...

hangle: 너와 보낼 시간을 그 영애에게 빼앗기는 것도 싫은데.
first_translate: ...I don’t want to spend less time with you because of her.
what?

hangle: 에이. 뭐 그런 농담을 하고 그래?
first_translate: haa, stop joking around.
I wasn’t kidding.

hangle: 리비아 영애보다 나와 노는 게 더 재밌을 거야.
first_translate: I bet hanging out with me will be way more fun than spending time with lady livia.
I promise to work harder toward that end.
huh...?
fiona.
